description:
Stay comfy in the car, in your boat, and on your favourite post-paddle patio. Made from a light and burly nylon blend, the Benny boardshorts are great for days on the water, or on land.

  • Rugged Element™ material wears well, has plenty of stretch, and dries quickly
  • Supplex® nylon waistband doesn’t stretch, so when you lace-in your perfect fit, your shorts stay put
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
  • Zippered fly with a hook-and-loop and lace-up closure
  • Zippered rear pocket keeps cards and keys secure
  • Relaxed fit leaves plenty of room to move
name: NRS Benny Board Shorts - Men's
